text:
It was a place where vibrant and beautiful peach trees spread,
with beautiful fields and ponds, a place isolated from the outside world.

Far removed from the fierce battles and heavenly revolution of the otherworld Penglai,
it was a peaceful and idyllic utopia for people- Shangri-La.

One day, a fisherman wandered into such a place.
The inhabitants of Shangri-La welcomed and entertained the fisherman.

The fisherman even wished to live there forever,
such was the charm of this dreamlike place, but the time to return to reality came.

The fisherman had a family and a life in the outside world and had to return.
He was warned not to speak of Shangri-La to anyone else and left the place.

But the fisherman wished to go to Shangri-La once more.
However, he was never able to set foot in it again.
Realizing he couldn't find it on his own, the fisherman decided to reveal the existence of Shangri-La to others, despite being told not to speak of it.

However, no matter how virtuous a person was,
they would never able to reach Shangri-La-

name: Tianzun
text:
Can you all figure out why this
fisherman couldn't find Shangri-La?

name: Sanzo
text:
Yes, yes, yes! Shangri-La, even for minors— Oh wait, that's a lie!
I-Isn't it because he broke the taboo of not speaking of it?

name: Tianzun
text:
That's one way to look at it. But why was it okay for the
fisherman who stumbled in by chance, but not for virtuous people?

name: Ganglie
text:
That's simple. It's only natural to think that Shangri-La
never existed in the first place, isn't it, Master Hermit?

name: Ganglie
text:
That's why I don't expect anything from utopias;
I just indulge in the idleness of reality, ehehe.

Amidst the Taoists' atmosphere of 'what is this guy talking about',
Tianzun showed a different reaction.

name: Tianzun
text:
As expected of you, Ganglie, that's certainly an interpretation.
Shangri-La never existed anywhere in this world.

name: Tianzun
text:
That means, to value your life in reality.
It's a lesson to strive to make reality Shangri-La.

name: Motosumi
text:
Hey, hey, is it really okay for a hermit living
in the celestial realm to say such a thing?

name: Tianzun
text:
Attaining the celestial realm doesn't necessarily lead to happiness.
I've seen many who ended their lives before reaching the peak.

name: Tianzun
text:
That's how long and arduous the path is.
Therefore, I do not reject the idea of a life of pleasure.

name: Tianzun
text:
You all should also think carefully about
what path you will take from now on.

Everyone except Ganglie, who was picking his nose, listened intently
to Tianzun's serious voice, which was unlike his usual carefree tone.

name: Motosumi
text:
Anyway, how did the conversation about us not being able
to find you when you suddenly disappeared turn into this!?

name: Tianzun
text:
That just means...
The more you search, the more you won't be able to find me!

name: Motosumi
text:
Hey, if you just stopped wandering off,
we wouldn't have to look for you, huh?

name: Tianzun
text:
...Jack, is it okay for you
to be slacking off here? Hmmmm?

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Leave me alone. You, if you wander around school in
that outfit alone, you'll cause quite a stir, just so you know?

Tianzun offered Jack, who seemed to be sulking,
a dango with sauce.

name: Tianzun
text:
This is a dango from my recommended wagashi shop in Asakusa.
It's sweet and delicious, so do try it.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh... Ah, it's good.
No, you are supposed to be in the classroom for the explanation, aren't you?

name: Tianzun
text:
I don't have to explain myself to you.
You're slacking off here too, aren't you?

Jack Frost realized it was useless to say anything more,
and bit into the dango.

name: Tianzun
text:
You'd probably know this yourself,
but the preparations for the Santa Departure Ceremony are about to begin.

name: Tianzun
text:
What are you going to do?
I'm sure you know that if you continue to work as Frosty during this period, you'll be exposed?

name: Jack Frost
text:
What, are you here to lecture me too?
You guys are really meddlesome.

name: Tianzun
text:
Now, now, don't say that.
I want everyone to be happy.

name: Tianzun
text:
Just as you want children to be happy,
it's even more so when it's your friends, right?

name: Jack Frost
text:
You say such things so casually...
What an embarrassing old man.

name: Tianzun
text:
Awwww, did you know that you're really cute when you are embarrassed?
What, even your face is turning red.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh, shut up!
I'm not delighted at all!

Tianzun, who was teasing Jack,
suddenly changed to a serious tone.

name: Tianzun
text:
Seriously, you're not always Frosty, are you?
You spend more time as Jack.

name: Tianzun
text:
Then, I think you should clear up the misunderstanding with your classmates,
so you can be happy even when you're Jack.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well, it's not really a misunderstanding or anything.
It's just true that I'm unfriendly...

name: Jack Frost
text:
And don't suddenly start talking so seriously.
The difference is so great I think I'm the one catching colds instead.

name: Tianzun
text:
Don't say such sad things.
The Jack I know loves children, is charming, and shy-

name: Jack Frost
text:
Alright, I get it, I get it!
It's embarrassing, so stop it already!!

Tianzun grinned lecherously and grabbed
Jack's cheek, ruffling it.

name: Tianzun
text:
If you lack confidence, I'll tell you as many times as it takes.
I'm good at finding people's happy sides!

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Fine.
Thanks, Tianzun.
Jack spoke with a slightly tearful voice to the still cheerful Tianzun.

name: Tianzun
text:
What's the matter, Jack?
Don't tell me, you're crying?

name: Jack Frost
text:
I-I'm not crying!
Some dust just got into my eyes...
Just then-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gah, one after another...!
You guys are really annoying!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I said I'm not crying!
What's wrong with you guys, coming one after another...!

options.text: Tianzun, did you make him cry!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I said I'm not crying!
What's wrong with you guys, coming one after another...!

name: Tianzun
text:
What, [Player],
did you come because you were worried about Jack too?

options.text: Yes, I came to call him.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I'm a hidden graffiti artist, you know?
I've been working without anyone knowing, yet-

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ah, alright, alright!
Geez, everyone's coming from everywhere...!

name: Tianzun
text:
What, what?
Aren't you surprisingly obedient when [Player] asks you?

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, I was just fed up.
All of you, constantly coming one after another.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, why are you making such a gloomy face out here?
Shall I tie you up with my tentacles and drag you inside?

Saying that, Hastur carefully put on disposable protective gloves-
Or rather, gloves for his tentacles, and directed his wriggling appendages towards the opponent.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ngh-! Ngh-!!
Stop it, you-!!

name: Yoshito
text:
What's so embarrassing about liking children?
It feels good to say what you like.

name: Jack Frost
text:
I think you should restrain yourself a little...
But well, I'm certainly envious.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Oh, you're here. What are you doing in a place like this?
If you're going to slack off, go make the children happy as Frosty.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Eh... You, what are you here for?
I thought you'd came to say something encouraging.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'm only warm to small children.
The idea that being warm makes things go well is just a fantasy.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Reality can be quite harsh, you know?
There are some irrational things in this world that can't be helped.

name: Jack Frost
text:
......
You're right.

name: Tianzun
text:
What, you were acting aloof,
but you were worried about him after all?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Seriously, every single one of you
treats me like a child.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Haa... I guess I have no choice. I'll go back to the classroom.
But I'm not going to say anything.

name: Tianzun
text:
Well, that's fine.
Even that is a big step forward.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, we're all back.
I brought a special guest!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hey, that's not what we talked about! Don't make my introduction even more awkward!
I was planning to just blend in quietly...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, Brother, Uncle!
I was waiting for you. Hurry, hurry, we have to start the explanation!

name: Jack Frost
text:
No, I'm going back to my seat.
You guys can talk amongst yourselves-

name: Hastur
text:
Do you think I'll let you escape?
Kukuku, it would be strange if we were here and you weren't.

Hastur tried to drag Jack with his tentacles,
but this time, Jack dodged before being entangled.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hah, do you think I'd fall for the same trick so many times!?
If you try that again, I'll freeze you all solid!

name: Therian Student
text:
I think this is the first time
I've seen Jack-kun smile in a long time...

name: Male Student
text:
Are you Jack-kun's friends?
You seem quite close.

options.text: It's embarrassing to be asked directly.

name: Hastur
text:
Well, I suppose I can allow that.
Be grateful!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Actually, I came up with the idea of holding the
departure ceremony at the amusement park thanks to Brother Jack!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, Jack was also the main one in charge of
the decorations in the park, you know?

name: Female Student
text:
Jack-kun...!? But he always gets top grades in class,
so maybe he is the right person?

name: Therian Student
text:
Whatever, it's nice that we're getting somewhere!
Snegurochka-chan's new appearance is the best!!

Jack, prompted by Snegurochka's words,
was flustered as his classmates spoke to him.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, the detailed plan was thought up by
Uncle Tianzun, the missionary of happiness!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Brother Hastur for costumes and Santa's transformation,
and Yoshito-san, who is good at sewing, for the costume details-

name: Snegurochka
text:
Not to mention, [Player]-san has introduced various
collaborators with their wide network!

name: Snegurochka
text:
And thanks to Korpokkur-san and everyone from Kita Ward,
Ojibo Academy, for their hidden support!!

The ownership and collaboration for this event were,
of course, not handled by Korpokkur alone.

Ojibo Academy, experts in early childhood education, were deeply involved in everything
from planning to operation, figuring out how to capture children's hearts.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, thank you so much for your cooperation.
Thanks to you, we'll be able to have the best departure ceremony!

options.text: Let's work hard on the preparations!
I'm looking forward to the actual event~

text:
And so, the Santa School students seriously began
preparing for the departure ceremony at Magical Snowland.

Chapter 3:
Magical Santa Departure Ceremony

name: Trickster
text:
Wow~ that's amazing!
It's completely in Christmas colors now...!

name: Child
text:
They're going to have a Santa Departure Ceremony
on Christmas Eve, apparently! I'm so excited!

Inside the park, decorations were already progressing for the departure ceremony,
and children's eyes sparkled as they looked at the trees and wreaths.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Amazing... the decorations are perfect!
Thank you for your cooperation, Itzamna-san!

name: Itzamna
text:
Hehe, it's nothing. If it's for the children,
I can't just stay cooped up in my kotatsu.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Um... by any chance,
the famous Christmas art graffiti that's talked about...

name: Itzamna
text:
Hmm? You don't know?
That Christmas art was by yours-

Just as Itzamna was about to finish his sentence,
a sudden chill struck him, causing him to yelp and jump back.

name: Jack Frost
text:
You hate winter, yet you go through all this trouble,
and even dress up like that.

name: Itzamna
text:
How about it, does it suit me?
Snegurochka-dono taught me to start with the appearance.

name: Itzamna
text:
Even you, it would be difficult to dye this vast
amusement park in Christmas colors all by yourself.

name: Tomte
text:
Itzamna-sensei!
I made some decorations around the castle, what do you think?

name: Itzamna
text:
Oh, a white birch wreath, splendid work!
I sense artistic talent in you!

Itzamna, who was in charge of the decoration team,
and Jack spoke in low voices so only both of them could hear.

name: Itzamna
text:
(You came here because you didn't want to openly
give orders to the Santa School students, right?)

Jack Frost, in the direction of modern art,
honestly bowed his head to the teacher he was indebted to.

name: Jack Frost
text:
(So you knew.
Thanks, grandpa, you really saved me.)

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you so much!
I never thought Brother would have such amazing acquaintances...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
The Christmas event booth is also progressing smoothly,
and as for the limited-time food-

name: Child
text:
...!
This cake is so delicious!

name: Yule
text:
That's good. We'll prepare even more kinds
of food menus by Christmas, so please come and visit again.

name: Ryota
text:
You're amazing, Yule!
To be able to make such delicious cakes... nom nom nom.

name: Choji
text:
The other Santa School students are also very quick learners,
and you can really feel the love and care for the children in their cooking.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Choji
dialogue_after_selection.text:
The pleasure is all mine, [Player].
Thank you for giving us such a wonderful opportunity.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Choji
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's not often you get to see so many children's happy and delighted faces.

options.text: Ryota, you came to help, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ryota
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course! I helped by removing strawberry stems and such.
But, tasting is the most important job, isn't it!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yule
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehe, that's right.
Choji-san is a good teacher, so...

name: Snegurochka
text:
Ah, Choji-san, everyone, thank you for your hard work.
How are things going with the cooking team?

name: Ryota
text:
Snegurochka-chan, welcome~!
Things are going great here!

name: Yule
text:
Geez~ why is Ryota answering when he's just been tasting all this time?
But, indeed, things are going very well right now!

name: Choji
text:
He's right. We've already taught them the required number of menu items,
and now we're exploring if we can create or plan anything else.

options.text: I wonder if Hastur and the others are okay?

name: Snegurochka
text:
I'm about to go check on them now!
Since we're here, why don't you come with me, [Player]?

name: Choji
text:
[Player], you can leave this to us.
I'll take responsibility for the cooking team.

options.text: Choji, good luck to you guys too.
Now... who should I go see?
Hastur was at the castle, right?
Yoshito was at the plaza, right?

text:
As [Player] and the others stepped into the plaza,
children came running happily from the opposite direction.

The children's eyes sparkled as they looked at the trees and wreaths in the amusement park,
which was being transformed by the colors of Christmas.

name: Trickster
text:
Wow, it's so much more sparkling and fun than usual!
As expected, Christmas is the best!

name: Child
text:
But lately, we haven't seen Frosty, have we...?
I wonder if he caught a cold?

dialogue_after_selection.text:
At that moment, [Player] was
suddenly hugged tightly from behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehehe, you all~
Why the gloomy faces~?

options.text: Jack, will he be okay for the departure ceremony...?

dialogue_after_selection.text: At that moment, [Player] was suddenly hugged tightly from behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehehe, you all~
Why the gloomy faces~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Child
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really? Thank god...
I love Frosty, so I was really worried for him.
At that moment, [Player] was suddenly hugged tightly from behind.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hehehehe, [Player]~
You're such a kind one, shall I pat your head?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Uncle Tianzun!
I was just about to go meet you all, but...

name: Tianzun
text:
You were worried about Jack, weren't you?
I was wandering around the park and heard voices wishing for Frosty.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Yes, when I saw him earlier, he seemed fine,
but he must have heard them, and-

name: Tianzun
text:
He's probably not feeling calm inside... I suppose.
I was just looking for Jack, where did you saw him~?

options.text: You care a lot about Jack, don't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, are you jealous?
Isn't that cute~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm a morals teacher, you see.
I feel compelled to guide those who are unable to walk the path they desire.

options.text: You're good at taking care of others.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What, are you jealous?
Isn't that cute~

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm a morals teacher, you see.
I feel compelled to guide those who are unable to walk the path they desire.

options.text: He was with the decoration team, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Snegurochka
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that's right.
He was with Itzamna-san, so shall I guide you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, please do.
As a morals teacher, I must care for those who are unable to walk the path they desire.

name: Tianzun
text:
Jack is dissatisfied with the current situation.
But he's in a state where he can't take that final step forward.

name: Tianzun
text:
It's like a roller coaster. It's fun to ride, but the waiting line
is the scariest part, because it's hard to muster the courage to line up.

options.text: Well, I get what you mean.
No, it's scary even when you are on it.

name: Tianzun
text:
And so, I've come up with a brilliant idea,
just like I did with Hastur.

Tianzun pointed his finger lightly,
and there stood Jack and Itzamna.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hey, Jack, are you free? I have something
I want to do, just a little... Can you lend this old man a hand?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Gah, you old geezer!
Can't you ask someone else!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A father who tries to dye me in his own colors is a bit much.
Isn't overwriting supposed to be my domain?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Itzamna
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hahaha, well, that's good, Jack.
You found an art buddy who shares your hobby, huh?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Itzamna
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], Tianzun-dono.
Please take care of Jack.

options.text: Grandpa, thank you for coming in the cold.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Itzamna
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hehehe, Grandpa will come running even in the bitter cold for you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, you said it was for me earlier, didn't you?
Don't suddenly get all lovey-dovey.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Itzamna
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll take care of the decoration team, so you two go ahead.
Tianzun-dono, please take care of Jack for me.

options.text: Jack~ I came to see you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hah!?
Do you really have to cling onto me every time we meet!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Itzamna
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haha, good for you, Jack.
Tianzun-dono, please take care of Jack for me.

name: Jack Frost
text:
W-Wait!?
I didn't say I was going!?

name: Snegurochka
text:
Now, now.
Let us go and take a break, alright?

Each person continued with their preparations for Christmas.
Time doesn't stop; it only melts away.

And just like that, Christmas Eve arrived,
the day of the Santa Departure Ceremony—

The Magical Snowland was filled with the sound of bells and Christmas songs.
Yes, today was finally Christmas Eve.

Santa School students, transformed into the figures
children wished to meet, filled the park.

The excited voices of children could be heard everywhere,
before their longed-for heroes.

name: Krampus
text:
I never thought there would be
children who liked Christmas so much.

name: Krampus
text:
It's a little embarrassing, but well,
I guess it's okay to be doted on by children a little.

name: Krampus
text:
Once the departure ceremony is over,
I'll go back to being the terrifying Krampus.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Krampus
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
Your cheering makes me want to try harder.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Krampus
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
Your cheering makes me want to try harder.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Krampus
dialogue_after_selection.text: Understood, thank you for cooperating with us Santas in various ways.

name: Krampus
text:
Later, we'll also have a hero show in the plaza.
If you'd like, please come watch!

After passing through the plaza,
the first place that [Player] came was-

name: Hastur
text:
Haaah-hah-hah-hah-hah!
Welcome, little ones, for I, the prince, shall invite you to my castle!

name: Hastur
text:
The attraction in my castle is an impregnable great labyrinth!
I have prepared a reward for those who manage to reach the deepest part!

Descending the stairs gracefully was Hastur,
the lord of the castle in Christmas Magical Snowland.

name: Child
text:
Ahhhh! My prince, if I reach your room,
please make me your princess!!

name: Child
text:
Ah, that's unfair, that's unfair!
I thought of it first!!

name: Hastur
text:
Hmm... what are you doing, you all?
It's Christmas, so your wishes shouldn't be so reckless...

name: Hastur
text:
Well, if you are so filled with your faith in me,
I suppose I can allow you a picture or two.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're here, [Player].
Feast your eyes, for my greatness seems to have finally spread to this Tokyo.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you're free, wouldn't you deny me the honor to challenge my attraction?
Beware, for you might not return alive!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're here, [Player].
Feast your eyes, for my greatness seems to have finally spread to this Tokyo.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If you're free, wouldn't you deny me the honor to challenge my attraction?
Beware, for you might not return alive!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're here, [Player].
Hmph, how endearing, to hide among the little ones.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hastur
dialogue_after_selection.text: If you, my adversary, wish to worship me so much, then come to the deepest part of this castle!

name: Hastur
text:
Once you step into this inviolable territory of this Hastur,
you are sure to be entangled in madness.

name: Hastur
text:
Now, little ones!
I await you at the goal, hah-hah-hah-hah-hah!

options.text: I wonder if he'll sulk if I don't go.

text:
As Hastur disappeared into the castle,
a marching band could be heard from the plaza outside the castle.

name: Yoshito
text:
Hello, welcome to the Eight Dog Warriors' Marching Band!
May our cheerful music make your hearts dance, even just a little!

name: Yoshito
text:
Allow me to introduce our adorable wind-up members.
Moritaka on castanets, Tadatomo on trombone-

Each time the mini Eight Dog Warrior robots operated by Yoshito appeared,
cheers erupted from the children.

options.text: Yoshito, did you get permission for that...?

name: Yoshito
text:
Master... you're here!
If you had told me, I would have come to you!

name: Yoshito
text:
Hehe, please rest assured. These are my automaton dolls.
I have obtained permission from all the Eight Dog Warriors for them.

name: Yoshito
text:
It was quite a struggle, but in the end,
everyone willingly nodded their heads.

options.text: You didn't use my name to trick them, did you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yasuyori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-dono... wanted an automaton of me...!?
No, I... don't have a problem with it, but...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yasuyori
dialogue_after_selection.text: It's a little embarrassing... for [Player]-dono to have something like that... *mumble*

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tadatomo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Huh, what!?
My lord wanted an automaton of me!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tadatomo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why can't it be me instead!?
My lord, I shall present myself as your very Christmas gift!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I will remain silent about the method of persuasion. Please be assured, we just had a peaceful discussion.

options.text: You didn't threaten them, did you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Masashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
An automaton of me...?
Even for someone like Mother, that would be a bit-

dialogue_after_selection.name: Masashi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No! It's alright, Yoshito-dono!
For a leading figure like me, Mother would be disappointed if I can't do such a simple favor.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Masanori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
An automaton of me?
...Could it be, that they wanted to do something sinister again?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Masanori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I shall confirm with [Player] at once.
If they really wanted an automaton of me or not.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Masanori
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...If I refuse, my automaton is going to look like a cat?
Wait, th- that's the one thing I don't want to happen!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...I will remain silent about the method of persuasion. Please be assured, we just had a peaceful discussion.

options.text: Indeed, some of them would probably agree.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nobumichi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, an automaton of me? Not of Moritaka...?
Oh well, strange things are bound to happen sometimes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Nobumichi
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Alright, alright, just make it really chic and sophisticated.
Make sure it conveys your big brother's charm well, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tanetomo
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player]-san wanted an automaton of me?
Hehe, you don't have to lie like that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tanetomo
dialogue_after_selection.text: That's very much fine, b-u-t, make sure that I, am the cutest of all of them, alright?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: At least two of them came out fine through peaceful discussion...?

name: Yoshito
text:
...Well, now that the children are waiting,
let's keep this conversation brief.

When Yoshito pressed a button, the automaton Eight Dog Warriors
began to play marching songs and Christmas songs.

The children were captivated, swaying their bodies to the music
and clapping their hands, enjoying themselves.

options.text: You should have explained the content properly.

name: Yoshito
text:
Well... perhaps so.
It's nice to have all the Eight Dog Warriors gathered like this... hehehe.

name: Yoshito
text:
Which of the Eight Dog Warriors is your favourite, Master?
Surely, it's Moritaka, right? Right??

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hehe... Master, you're kind, so I thought you might say that.

options.text: I'm a fan of the whole group.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hehe... Master, you're kind, so I thought you might say that.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, you're joking again.
There's no way that's true.
Yoshito's ears, visible even from behind as he turned his face away in self-deprecation, were bright red.

text:
Children, who had heard their conversation, began to shout
out the names of their favorite dolls: "This one!" "That one!"
And among the children, there was-

name: Trickster
text:
Brother!!
You're the most sparkling one!

name: Yoshito
text:
...!?
I-Is that so, you really see me that way? Thank you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I have Moritaka and the others with me.
Master, please enjoy the park at ease.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then, I shall see you later.
Let's meet again at the finale.

options.text: (Look at him with a knowing smile)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Master, please stop looking at me with that expression.
As you can see, I'm fine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You came to check on me because you thought I was unreliable, didn't you?
But I have Moritaka and the others with me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, please enjoy the park at ease.
Let's meet again at the finale.

options.text: (Watch him with a parental gaze from behind)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Master, please stop looking at me with that expression.
As you can see, I'm fine.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You came to check on me because you thought I was unreliable, didn't you?
But I have Moritaka and the others with me.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yoshito
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Master, please enjoy the park at ease.
Let's meet again at the finale.

options.text: Do your best, I'm cheering for you.

text:
Leaving the plaza where Yoshito's marching band was performing,
a large line for an attraction immediately came into view.

options.text: This place is, if I remember correctly-

name: Korpokkur
text:
Space Ranger cadets!
Welcome, I am the captain of this ship, Goronyapokkur.

name: Korpokkur
text:
This colony is 100% perfect, both in safety and functionality, a true utopia.
Children, all that is required of you is to have fun!

name: Korpokkur
text:
Yes, yes, the new recruits joining today
also have pretty good expressions-

The cast member Korpokkur was performing his act suddenly froze,
seemingly noticed [Player]'s presence.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ahem, I shall give you
the first mission now.

name: Korpokkur
text:
I'll be the one to chase you,
and if you can escape in the time limit, you win-

name: Korpokkur
text:
W-What's that!? Enemy invasion!?
I've received a report of an unknown life form!

note: The original bit is "OTNA", taken from 大人 (otona / grown-up, adults)

name: Korpokkur
text:
Ah, that's the unidentified life form, an A-Dult!!
This is bad, the peace of this colony will be...!

name: Korpokkur
text:
You all, I apologize to ask this right after your enlistment,
but you have to repel the A-Dults, by shooting them with these laser guns!

With the command, the spaceship carrying the
excited children departed, and the shooting attraction began.

name: Korpokkur
text:
...What's the matter, [Player]?
Your presence here, did you come to mock me?

options.text: I just came to check on you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, in that case, would you like to play one round?
Can you beat our Babe Bunyan's record?

options.text: You seem to be doing your best, Korpokkur.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: Well, you know, since Santa and you all are working so hard for the children.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I can't afford to lose.
I have to show the children that they don't have to grow up willingly.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
How about it, would you like to play one round?
Can you really beat our Babe Bunyan's record?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmm, in that case, would you like to play one round?
Can you beat our Babe Bunyan's record?

text:
It seemed that excellent scores were being recorded,
and Babe's record was engraved in the first-place column of the electronic signboard.

options.text: Anything in it for me if I do my best?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course.
You can get prizes and snacks that the Santa School guys prepared.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But for you specifically, well... I'll treat you a bit more special.
I'll give you a present.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't misunderstand, that's only if you get a high score.
At that time, I'll ask you again if you want a blessing, like in the old days.

Watching the figure holding the rifle, preparing to take on the attraction,
Korpokkur had an uncertain expression on his face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do your best and aim for a high score.
If you do achieve it, I'll give you a present.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Don't misunderstand, that's only if you get a high score.
At that time, I'll ask you again if you want a blessing, like in the old days.

Watching the figure holding the rifle, preparing to take on the attraction,
Korpokkur had an uncertain expression on his face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text: What, if you don't want to, I was thinking of giving you a reward if you got a high score.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Korpokkur
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, whatever, come visit me again if you feel like it.
But, it's almost time for the parade.
Korpokkur looked at [Player], who turned and walked away, with a conflicted expression.

name: Korpokkur
text:
......
...Hey, [Player].

name: Korpokkur
text:
Nah, it's just nothing.
Have fun, [Player].

Leaving Korpokkur's attraction,
[Player] had returned to the plaza.

Along the paths extending in all directions from the plaza,
many children were lined up, waiting for something.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Hmm, what, you came to see it too?
Is it okay if I sit next to you? I might be a little chilly, though.

Jack, who found [Player], came over and spoke.
He was holding Christmas limited edition food in both hands.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then excuse me. Do you want something to eat?
I have chicken, cake, and various other things.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But I only have one ice pop, so anything but that.
It's my favorite, though I have to watch out for putting on weight in winter.

options.text: My cold weather gear is perfect, so I'm fine!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Then excuse me. Do you want something to eat?
I have chicken, cake, and various other things.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But I only have one ice pop, so anything but that.
It's my favorite, though I have to watch out for putting on weight in winter.

options.text: I'm so touched that Jack himself came to sit next to me!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What are you talking about?
Don't make such a weird reaction!
You're the ones who keep going on about being friends...

text:
As he spoke, he put food into his mouth,
then took out a warm drink from a bag and handed it to [Player].

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text: No way, it's just that the cooking team's food is too delicious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text: ...Well, it's also reassuring to have something to do when talking one-on-one with someone, rather than just standing around awkwardly.

options.text: Wait, weren't you bad with warm things?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Damn it, you just have to be so observant about the strangest things!
Yes, I prepared it especially for you when I saw you!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, I'm fully in my 'socially awkward artist' mode.
It's more reassuring to have something to do than just stand around awkwardly!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Damn it, you just have to be so observant about the strangest things!
Yes, I prepared it especially for you when I saw you!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Sorry, I'm fully in my 'socially awkward artist' mode.
It's more reassuring to have something to do than just stand around awkwardly!

text:
Yes, Jack was not in his Frosty costume now.
A particularly white breath escaped his mouth, like he was exhaling something.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Sorry. Even though you all
tried so hard to push me forward.

name: Jack Frost
text:
In the end, I couldn't muster the courage to show
my Frosty self in front of the Santa School students.

name: Jack Frost
text:
The most I can do is think about
Snegurochka, just her. That's all I can manage.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Even so, I feel like 'it's okay to stay as I am' more than before.
Maybe it's because I met you all.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Because you all didn't think it was strange that someone like me became
a mascot character at an amusement park and acted like 'I love children~'

options.text: It's okay to be on the enjoying side today!

name: Jack Frost
text:
I visited most of Hastur's attractions.
They were all surprisingly well-suited for his roles.

name: Jack Frost
text:
And when the time came, just like you,
I came to see Snegurochka and Tianzun's parade.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Tianzun and the others asked me to paint the parade car,
so I figured I had to watch it.

At that moment, an announcement played in the park,
and the parade cars entered the plaza.

Sparkling snow began to fall, and a parade car
shaped like a glittering, illuminated tree appeared.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, are you having fun~?
Today's Christmas, so let's all have a blast and enjoy ourselves!
Having noticed [Player] and Jack, Snegurochka waved happily.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Everyone, behold Magical Girl Snegurochka's
special Christmas magic!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Let's all chant together, okay?
Kira-kira Pappah! Piraporepah!!

Along with the children lined up for the parade,
they chanted the magic spell, and an aurora appeared from the parade car.

It was a large-scale projection mapping realized
through the collaboration of various partners.

The aurora was projected onto the falling snow,
and exclamations of awe rose from everywhere.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
That snowflake?
Well, she could really use some advice on handling cold air.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jack Frost
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You're really getting into it, aren't you...?
You've completely blended in with the children.

text:
At that moment, the snow dancing in the sky changed
to a poisonous color, thanks to the lighting effects.

name: Jack Frost
text:
W-What!?
I wasn't informed of this kind of show!?

A sinister castle parade car appeared,
spewing smoke of the same color.

name: Tianzun
text:
Wah-hah-hah-hah-hah!!
The Happy Great Demon King has descended on this holy night!!

name: Tianzun
text:
Little ones, I will make
all of you as happy as could be!

The children were once again overjoyed by the appearance of Tianzun,
the Happy Great Demon King.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Happy Great Demon King!?
...What, isn't he supposed to be a very good person!?

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, I do wonder about that.
I do know that I want to be happy myself!

Declaring so, Tianzun lightly leaped from the
parade car, heading straight for [Player].

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, I've secured the source of my happiness!
Now, let's be happy together!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hold on!?
No matter how much love you may have, forcing it on them isn't good!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hmm~? Whether it's forced or not,
why don't you ask them directly~?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hehehe, I'm super happy, but this is a skit, so please pretend to dislike it.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Tianzun
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hehehe, I'm super happy, but this is a skit, so please pretend to dislike it.

name: Snegurochka
text:
That person dislikes it!
Please hold on, because I, Magical Girl Snegurochka will help you!

name: Tianzun
text:
Do you think you can stop this Happy Great Demon King!?
I'll make you happy, happy, happy too!

name: Snegurochka
text:
N-No way...!
Happy Great Demon King, you're such a formidable opponent!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, of course!
I'm strengthened by my power of love for [Player]!

name: Tianzun
text:
You said it yourself, didn't you?
That love conquers magic.

name: Snegurochka
text:
What do I do, at this rate...
If I'm by myself, I won't be able to win.

Cheers of "Don't lose, Snegurochka!"
rose from the children.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Thank you, everyone.
I, will try my best a little harder!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehe, it's useless, you alone cannot defeat me.
Unless you have a powerful helper by your side...!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Indeed, I don't have a powerful helper...
Everyone, do you know any kind people in this amusement park who can help me?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh, this feels bad.
Those guys, are they planning to...!

Jack's bad feeling was right;
A voice calling out to "Frosty" rose from among the children.

name: Snegurochka
text:
Frosty-san...?
Alright, I'll believe in everyone, will you call him with me?

name: Snegurochka
text:
One, two... Frosty!
I need your help~!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
N-No matter how much you call me,
I... I...

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, you're not going?
I can throw you in with my tentacles if you'd prefer?

Before Jack knew it, Hastur was beside him,
and Yoshito also appeared.

name: Yoshito
text:
Frosty, I brought your costume.
With Hastur's power, you can come up there right now.

name: Tianzun
text:
Jack, you're still...
Snegurochka, you should transition to the sub-story I prepared-

name: Tianzun
text:
No, it's fine.
He'll be fine.

At that moment, a figure leaped from the parade.
A loud cheer rose from the children.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Did you call for me, Snegurochka?
You sure seem to be in a pinch, so I'll help you with that!

name: Snegurochka
text:
...! Frosty!
Thank you, we can win if there's the two of us, right!?

name: Yoshito
text:
Frosty, you are not alone.
Happy Great Demon King, do you know who you're kidnapping?

name: Children
text:
Wow~ toy soldiers!
Do your best~!!

As the children who were listening to the marching band cheered,
Yoshito smiled naturally and waved back.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, Happy Great Demon King,
I, Hastur, will lend you a hand!

name: Tianzun
text:
Oh, you can be the Happy Prince!
A 3 vs 1 was sure to be tough, so this was a relief!

name: Hastur
text:
Hey! Don't just give me a weird name!
Do you require me to punish you first!?

name: Children
text:
It's the Prince of the Castle!
I'll cheer for you, Prince! Do your best~!!

Hastur responded with a defiant smile to the
cheers of the children visiting the castle.

name: Korpokkur
text:
Space Ranger makes his appearance!
You can't forget about me, can you?

name: Tianzun
text:
Ooh, now our numbers are equal,
so we won't lose either, right?

name: Korpokkur
text:
What are you saying? I'm on the side of the children,
so of course I'll side with the magical girl!

name: Jack Frost
text: You guys...

name: Yoshito
text:
How about it, Jack?
After you make your appearance, we'll follow suit.

name: Hastur
text:
Hmph, that'll draw less attention to you, I suppose?
Our presence will be so strong that no one will even notice yours.

name: Jack Frost
text:
What do I think about that?
It's... it does give me a little courage.

name: Yoshito
text:
Come forth, my toy soldiers, and you too, Snegurochka, Frosty.
The power of our friendship, we shall show it to them.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Everyone, your smiles will give us strength,
so please push us on!

name: Snegurochka
text:
Hehe, I'll cast my special magic now!
Frosty, let's do our best together!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hastur, you take care of the toy soldiers and Frosty,
and I'll be in charge of Magical Girl and the Space Ranger.

name: Hastur
text:
Ahahahaha, Frosty~!
Do you really think you'd stand a chance against me?
Battle Start

Snegurochka and her friends'
parade show reaches its climax.

name: Male Student
text:
Wait, isn't that Frosty... Jack-kun?
I thought they looked really similar.

name: Female Student
text:
Ah, so he decided to reveal it to everyone.
I thought he was keeping it a secret...

name: Therian Student
text:
What, you knew?
Why didn't you tell me~!!

name: Female Student
text:
Yeah, I'm a big fan and I own all of his merchandise!
I'll go get his autograph later.

Under the watchful eyes of the Santa School students,
the decisive moment finally arrived.

name: Tianzun
text:
Mmm~ I surrender, I surrender~!
Have mercy~!

name: Hastur
text:
What!? It's just getting started!
Watch me, I'll beat all of them by myself...

name: Tianzun
text:
Hastur, need I remind you that this is just a parade show?
Just pretend to be defeated quietly.

name: Children
text:
Woah~ Snegurochka, Frosty~!
That was amazing~!!

name: Tianzun
text:
Jack, take a look over there.
Those there should be your classmates.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ugh... I was so engrossed in the parade
that I forgot about it halfway through...

name: Female Student
text:
Ah, our eyes met! Ah, um... Frosty!
You were very cute~!!

name: Jack Frost
text:
C-Cute...!?
Ahahaha~ thank you~!

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, even if you're not used to being called cute by children,
you're not used to being called cute by your classmates, are you?

name: Male Student
text:
Why didn't you tell me you were behind something this amazing!?
Let's take a picture together later!

name: Jack Frost
text:
Aah... of course.
If you don't mind, I'd like to join you.

name: Therian Student
text:
What, you are surprisingly professional!
This isn't like you at school at all!

Jack was surrounded by his classmates,
talking with an embarrassed expression.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, Jack has a good look on his face.
I used a slightly forceful method, but it was worth it.

options.text: So you were popular with your classmates after all!

name: Female Student
text:
Hey, Jack-kun,
tell us about Frosty.

name: Jack Frost
text:
Ah, sorry, for the departure ceremony,
I want to be with my friends.

name: Female Student
text:
That's alright too,
you can tell me about it at school later!

Jack nodded and returned to
Tianzun and the others.

name: Tianzun
text:
Huh? What's wrong?
You finally made friends with your classmates, wasn't that good?

name: Jack Frost
text:
Well... it's not like that, I promised to talk to them at school.
...It's more fun to be with you all.

name: Tianzun
text:
What, aren't you a cute one~!
You want to be with us, right~?

name: Jack Frost
text:
That's right, what's wrong with that!
Ah~ alright, if you're going to be like that, I'm going over there!

name: Tianzun
text:
No, no, just kidding.
I'm happy too, having you with us.

name: Jack Frost
text:
...Thanks, Tianzun.
You're a good teacher.

name: Tianzun
text:
Hehehe, it's fine.
Now, let's all go to the Santa Departure Ceremony parade!
